name: Bitcoin Bounce
description:
Do you want to win Bitcoin just by playing games? Download Bitcoin Bounce and you are entered into free prize draws everyday!

Win Bitcoin, learn how to use it and have fun along the way!

HOW TO PLAY

Tap to land on the blockchain. Bitcoin will then bounce and you must time your tap to land again. The aim is to see how far you can get. Pick up POWER UPS to improve your score.

Also collect the THNDR TICKETS. They count as an entry into a prize draw to win real bitcoin.

POWER UPS

• Lightning Bolt: Speed Boost

• Shield: Protects Bitcoin

• Wormhole: Transports you along the blockchain

• Jumps: Land on them for a quick boost

THNDR TICKETS

Upon collecting THNDR TICKETS and accepting the prize draw terms and conditions, you will be in with a chance to win a prize of bitcoin via a prize draw.

Winnings are paid out to a Bitcoin Wallet via the Lightning Network. You must have a compatible wallet to receive any winnings.
